titles.title: Weir Farm National Historic Site Expansion Act of 1994
Weir Farm National Historic Site Expansion Act of 1994
A bill to expand the boundary of the Weir Farm National Historic Site in the State of Connecticut.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5074)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Department of the Interior, and Office of Management and Budget.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Johnston with amendments. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 647.

action.text: By Senator Johnston from Committee on Energy and Natural Resources filed written report. Report No. 103-418.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 9/27/1994--Reported to Senate amended. Weir Farm National Historic Site Expansion Act of 1994 - Amends the Weir Farm National Historic Site Establishment Act of 1990 to expand the boundary of the Weir Farm National Historic Site in Connecticut to include specified lands.
